items.q: How is ONPLY different from Spotify?
items.a: ONPLY is interactive: AI-mixed continuous feed, UGC mixes, social discovery. Spotify is passive playlists.
We plan a hybrid approach: direct licensing for core catalog + integrations. Creator uploads follow clear rules.

items.q: When can I try the app?
items.a: Closed beta in Q1 2026; public launch mid 2026.
Freemium model, ads/sponsorships, premium subscription, IAP, and future B2B licensing.
Solo founder leading product; advisors onboarding. Funding will accelerate team hiring (AI/ML, Mobile, Partnerships).
Request the pitch deck and schedule a call via founder@onplyapp.com.
